Network Security Consultant
Toronto Area - Mississauga, Ontario, Canada
This is an exciting full time permanent opportunity located at our offices at our Mississauga office (Dixie/Eglington). We are searching for a Network professional with strong focus on client satisfaction while delivering high quality services.

The responsibilities and specific work environment of this role are as follows:

·Provide Network Support in Tier 1 service level delivery
·Firewall administration, support and troubleshooting on Raptor, Checkpoint, and Pix – Raptor experience especially important
·Router/Switch experience
·VPN administration, support and troubleshooting
·Meet Service Levels specified in the contract between CGI and BM.
·Install server hardware and software
·Skilled in all aspects of server build & server hardware on Compaq platform
·Ability to resolve problems on a variety of software on other hardware platforms such as NT, UNIX, site server, MSMQ, SQL, clustered NT servers, IIS


Our ideal candidate will be a self-starter and have excellent interpersonal skills. We are looking for an individual with the ability to build strong relationships with our client(s) within a team environment. The successful candidate will have outstanding communication skills, both written and verbal.

Other elements of job, include pager coverage, shift work/after hours work, traveling (Mississauga/Toronto).

This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI is the fourth largest independent information technology services firm in North America providing end-to-end IT services and business solutions to more than 3,000 clients worldwide. CGI provides a full range of IT services, including consulting, systems integration, and the management of business and IT functions.

CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for this position start day one and includes a minimum of 3 weeks vacation, profit sharing and a stock purchase plan. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

No unsolicited agency referrals please.

(RE)

Must Have Skills

Raptor
Checkpoint
Cisco Pix
Router/Switch
NT/Win2000
VPN Administration, design & support
